name: goapp
description: This project assumes you have go and npm installed

scripts.install: npm run install-negroni && npm run install-render && npm run install-logger
scripts.start: sh -c 'GOPATH=`pwd -P` go build -o bin/server server.go' && sh -c 'GOPATH=`pwd =P` PORT=18883 GO_LOGFILE=/var/log/gologs/goapp.log GO_BASE_ROUTE=/goapp/ ./bin/server'
scripts.files: cp assets/favicon.ico public && cp assets/robots.txt public && cp assets/noext public && cp -r assets/images public
scripts.prestart: npm run js && npm run sass && npm run files

author: Julian Chan
